title: Non-Linear Interpolation Function
name: LGF_NonLinearInterpolation
description: Implements a characteristic curve defined via an interpolation point table with linear interpolation.

input.name: value
input.description: Input value for calculating the output value

input.name: defaultOutValue
input.description: Value for pre-assignment of the output variable

input.name: track
input.description: Follow the value of the input without using the characteristic curve

input.name: reset
input.description: Reset the interpolation if the point table is changed in running operation

output.name: outputValue
output.description: The calculated output value from the input value

in/out.name: setpoints
in/out.description: Setpoint table for defining the characteristic curve

user_defined_types.name: LGF_typeNonLinSetpoints
user_defined_types.description: Data type for setup a setpoint table
